data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Western.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Western, Ghana
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Western, Ghana who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Western, Ghana from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 615,170 believers in the state of Western the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Songhai-Koyraboro people.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Western, Ghana.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 615,170 believers in the state of Western to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Western, Ghana has a population of 2,376,000.

We estimate Western has 615,170 people who might know Jesus, 867,418 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 893,412 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Western, Ghana.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

location.name: Western
location.people_groups_list: Dagomba, Wala, Adele, Foodo, Anufo, Chokossi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dagomba (13,000), Wala (103,000), Adele (20,000), Foodo (1,100), Anufo, Chokossi (111,000)
